stories.Title: The calm after the storm?
stories.Description: Following the sudden upheaval on OpenAI's board, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has responded swiftly by recruiting Sam Altman and Greg Brockman for a pioneering AI research initiative.
stories.Tweet: The calm after the storm? 📦 Following the sudden upheaval on OpenAI's board, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has responded swiftly by recruiting Sam Altman and Greg Brockman for a pioneering AI research initiative. #microsoft https://techcrunch.com/2023/11/20/openai-co-founders-sam-altman-and-greg-brockman-to-join-microsoft/

stories.Title: Start the countdown
stories.Description: Apple's Vision Pro stands out as one of the most anticipated releases of 2024. That's why the company is taking its time with the launch, shifting from January to a potential March date.
stories.Tweet: Start the countdown 📦 Apple's Vision Pro stands out as one of the most anticipated releases of 2024. That's why the company is taking its time with the launch, shifting from January to a potential March date. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/11/19/gurman-apple-vision-pro-march-release/

stories.Title: We want Altman back
stories.Description: Over 600 OpenAI employees are calling for a board transformation after Sam Altman's abrupt exit. The request: meet their demands or face a mass migration to Altman's new initiative with Microsoft.
stories.Tweet: We want Altman back 📦 Over 600 OpenAI employees are calling for a board transformation after Sam Altman's abrupt exit. The request: meet their demands or face a mass migration to Altman's new initiative with Microsoft. #openai https://www.wired.com/story/openai-staff-walk-protest-sam-altman/

stories.Title: All for education
stories.Description: Amazon is advancing AI education with the launch of "AI Ready," which aims to train two million individuals globally in generative AI by 2025, promoting inclusivity with courses for all skill levels.
stories.Tweet: All for education 📦 Amazon is advancing AI education with the launch of "AI Ready," which aims to train two million individuals globally in generative AI by 2025, promoting inclusivity with courses for all skill levels. #amazon https://www.engadget.com/amazon-will-host-free-ai-ready-courses-in-an-effort-to-attract-new-talent-133851547.html

stories.Title: From responsible to generative
stories.Description: Continuing with their efforts in the "year of efficiency," Meta has restructured its AI approach by disbanding the Responsible AI division and relocating its members to different departments.
stories.Tweet: From responsible to generative 📦 Continuing with their efforts in the "year of efficiency," Meta has restructured its AI approach by disbanding the Responsible AI division and relocating its members to different departments. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/11/18/facebook-parent-meta-breaks-up-its-responsible-ai-team.html

stories.Title: What ever happened?
stories.Description: If the fast-changing OpenAI whirlwind caught you off guard this weekend, you're not alone. Explore this live coverage providing insights and setting the timeline straight.
stories.Tweet: What ever happened? 📦 If the fast-changing OpenAI whirlwind caught you off guard this weekend, you're not alone. Explore this live coverage providing insights and setting the timeline straight. #openai https://www.theverge.com/23966325/openai-sam-altman-fired-turmoil-chatgpt

stories.Title: Onward and upward, SpaceX
stories.Description: Starship's second flight ended with a bang, but it's the journey that counts. SpaceX's ability to learn and innovate is evident in the successful hot staging and upgraded engine performance.
stories.Tweet: Onward and upward, SpaceX 📦 Starship's second flight ended with a bang, but it's the journey that counts. SpaceX's ability to learn and innovate is evident in the successful hot staging and upgraded engine performance. #spacex https://techcrunch.com/2023/11/18/spacex-launches-starship-for-the-second-time-ever-going-farther-than-ever-before/

stories.Title: Big news from Psyche!
stories.Description: NASA is testing a new communication method for deep space missions by transmitting test data via laser from 10 million miles away, courtesy of the DSOC experiment riding on the Psyche mission.
stories.Tweet: Big news from Psyche! 📦 NASA is testing a new communication method for deep space missions by transmitting test data via laser from 10 million miles away, courtesy of the DSOC experiment riding on the Psyche mission. #space https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/nasa-dsoc-first-light/

stories.Title: Meet the Song L
stories.Description: BYD continues to make waves in China's ever-growing EV market with their mid-size electric SUV, Song L. Set to compete with Tesla's Model Y, it has already broken preorder records ahead of its launch.
stories.Tweet: Meet the Song L 📦 BYD continues to make waves in China's ever-growing EV market with their mid-size electric SUV, Song L. Set to compete with Tesla's Model Y, it has already broken preorder records ahead of its launch. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/11/20/byd-song-l-electric-suv-11k-pre-orders-launch/

stories.Title: Putting on a show
stories.Description: The Cybertruck is almost here! With just ten days until the official release, Tesla stirs up the excitement with a surprise appearance in US showrooms.
stories.Tweet: Putting on a show 📦 The Cybertruck is almost here! With just ten days until the official release, Tesla stirs up the excitement with a surprise appearance in US showrooms. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/11/20/tesla-bringing-cybertrucks-showrooms-ahead-launch/

title: OpenAI's internal whirlwind, Starship's adventure, Amazon's "AI Ready"
description: This weekend has been a wild ride with all the buzz around OpenAI, Sam Altman, and Microsoft. The stories are unfolding so fast—I'm trying to keep up! Then, on Saturday, bam! Starship's long-awaited flight finally happened. Sure, it ended in a fiery blast, but hey, it was still super interesting. Lastly, if you're looking forward to learning all about generative AI, make sure to check out Amazon's new program. It's free!
